vulnerabilities.title: Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS)
vulnerabilities.description: npm `ssri` 5.2.2-6.0.1 and 7.0.0-8.0.0, processes SRIs using a regular expression which is vulnerable to a denial of service. Malicious SRIs could take an extremely long time to process, leading to denial of service. This issue only affects consumers using the strict option.
